title: What can I do if my phone can't be detected by Bluetooth?
answer:
1. Go to the Bluetooth settings screen and check whether the visibility has expired. If it expires, set a proper time period and search for the Bluetooth again. 

 1. Check whether the two phones have paired. 

 1. If the Bluetooth can't be detected after you have performed the preceding steps, restore the phone to factory settings or clean up the user data. 

 1. If the problem persists, it may be caused by the hardware failure. Go to your local Huawei service center to test the hardware.
